snippet: The iPad Mini costs a bit more than competing tablets of a similar size, but Apple said on Monday that it sold three million new iPads in the first weekend that both the smaller iPad and the fourth-generation iPad went on sale. That matches the...
abstract: The iPad Mini costs a bit more than competing tablets of a similar size, but Apple said on Monday that it sold three million new iPads in the first weekend that both the smaller iPad and the fourth-generation iPad went on sale. That matches the number of third-generation iPads that Apple sold after the tablet's first weekend on sale in March.

headline.main: Apple Sells Three Million New iPads, Including Mini, in One Weekend
